name: ProjectSetup
description: Sets up the project in the folder given by `project_root/project_name`.

inputParameters.name: project_root
inputParameters.description: Path to the project root folder. If none is given, the default is the parent folder of this Grasshopper file.

inputParameters.name: project_name
inputParameters.description: Any name for the project. It will be used to create a folder with the same name in the project root folder. All files will be later saved here.
